metadata.title: CVE-2023-3355 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in the Linux kernel's drivers/gpu/drm/msm/msm_gem_submit.c code in the submit_lookup_cmds function, which fails because it lacks a check of the return value of kmalloc(). This issue allows a local user to crash the system.

criterions.comment: linux package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
